titleStmt.title: Täʾamrä Maryam “Miracles of Mary” / Täʾamrä Iyäsus “Miracles of Jesus” / Täʾamrä Qirqos “Miracles of Cyricus” / Sälam läki ḫoḫǝtä mǝśraq... “Salutation to you, Threshold of the East…” / Täʾamrä Libanos “Miracles of Libanos”

msItem.title: VI. Täʾamrä Libanos “Miracles of Libanos”
msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; name of the donor (hand b); groups of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1, I-2, I-4; II ; incipit of all other texts, incipit of sections and of subsections (sometimes only the first word); the word täfäśśǝḥi “rejoice” in Text I-3; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

span.span: ተኣምሪሁ፡ ለአቡነ፡ ሊባኖስ፡ ጻሎቱ፡ ወበረከቱ፡ የሀሉ፡ ምስለ፡ ገብ
፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡ ወካዕበ፡ ይቤሉኒ፡ እንዘ፡ ሀሎ፡ ስርናይ፡ መልዕልተ፡ ናሕሰ፡ ዘቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ዘአንበርዎ
ወወሰድዎ፡ ኀበ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ሊባኖስ፡ ወገነዩ፡ ሎቱ፡ በረከቱ፡ ትኵን፡ ምስለ፡ ፍቁሩ፡ ክፍለ፡ ማርያም፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፤

msItem.title: V. Sälam läki ḫoḫǝtä mǝśraq “Salutation to you, Threshold of the East…”
msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; name of the donor (hand b); groups of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1, I-2, I-4; II ; incipit of all other texts, incipit of sections and of subsections (sometimes only the first word); the word täfäśśǝḥi “rejoice” in Text I-3; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

span.span: ሰላም፡ ለኪ፡ ኆኀተ፡ ምሥራቅ፨ ዘወልደ፡ ኖሬ፡ ሰ፡ ለኪ፡ ዓፀድ፡ ዘእስከ፡ ደሬ

msItem.title: IV. End of an unidentified text
msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; name of the donor (hand b); groups of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1, I-2, I-4; II ; incipit of all other texts, incipit of sections and of subsections (sometimes only the first word); the word täfäśśǝḥi “rejoice” in Text I-3; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

span.span: ም፡ ወበእንተ፡ አፍቅሮትከ፡ ኪያነ፡ ለበስከ፡ ሥጋ፡ ሰብእ፡ ከመ፡ ትሠሃለኒ፡ ኦወልደ፡ ዳዊት፡ ተሠሃለኒ፡ ወጸግወኒ፡ ብርሃነ፡ ለአዕይንቲየ፡ በከመ፡ ፈታሕከ፡ ልሳንየ፨
ወሖሩ፡ ፈለገ፡ ዮርዳኖስ፨ ወተጠምቁ፡ ባእደ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ምጥ

msItem.title: III. Täʾamrä Qirqos “Miracles of Qirqos”
msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; name of the donor (hand b); groups of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1, I-2, I-4; II ; incipit of all other texts, incipit of sections and of subsections (sometimes only the first word); the word täfäśśǝḥi “rejoice” in Text I-3; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

incipit.p: Fol. 139ra, l.1: በስመ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ፩አምላክ፡ ነዋ፡ ጸሐፍነተ፡ አምሪሁ፡ ለቂርቆስ፡ ሰማዕት፡ ንስቲተ፡ እምብዙኃ፡ ከመ፡ ኢይኩን፡ ዝንጋዔ፡ ለሰማዕያን፡ ጸሎቱ፡ ወበረከቱ፡ የሀሉ፡ ምስለ፡ ክፍለ፡ ማርያም፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፡…

span.span: ወከመዝ፡ ገብረ፡ ሕፃን፡ ቂርቆስ፡ በረከተ፡ ጻሎቱ፡ የሀሎ፡ ምስለ፡ ገብሩ፡ ክፍለ፡ ማርያም፡ ወምስለ፡ ኵልነ፡ ውሉደ፡ ጥምቀት፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፨

note.span: II-1) About a pious king who accept to be a priest in the land of Roḥa.

msItem.title: II. Täʾamrä Iyäsus “Miracles of Jesus”
msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; name of the donor (hand b); groups of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1, I-2, I-4; II ; incipit of all other texts, incipit of sections and of subsections (sometimes only the first word); the word täfäśśǝḥi “rejoice” in Text I-3; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

incipit.p: Fol. 126ra, l.1: ተአምር፡ ዘገብረ፡ እግዚእነ፡ ወመድኅኒነ፡ ኢየሱስ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ እንዘ፡ ወእቱ፡ በሣህለ፡ ምሕረቱ፡ የሐውጻ፡ ለዓመቱ፡ ወለተ፡ ክርስቶስ፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፨ ወሶበ፡ ሰምዓት፡ ሰሎሜ፡ መወልዲት፡ ነገሮ…

explicit.p: Fol. 144vb, l.15: ኦእግዚእየ፡ ወልደ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ሕያው፡ ቀደማዊ፡ ዘይሴፈውዎ፡ አሕዛብ፡ ለመድኀኒቶሙ፡ አንተ፡ ውእቱ፡ ዘተነበዩ፡ ነቢያት፡ በእንቲአከ፡ አንተ፡ ውእቱ፡ ገበሪሁ፡

msItem.title: I. Täʾamrä Maryam “Miracles of Mary”
msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; name of the donor (hand b); groups of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1, I-2, I-4; II ; incipit of all other texts, incipit of sections and of subsections (sometimes only the first word); the word täfäśśǝḥi “rejoice” in Text I-3; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

msItem.title: I-4) Miracles of Mary
msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; name of the donor (hand b); groups of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1, I-2, I-4; II ; incipit of all other texts, incipit of sections and of subsections (sometimes only the first word); the word täfäśśǝḥi “rejoice” in Text I-3; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

div.span: ወዕለቱ፡ አመ፡ ፯፡ ለነሐሴ፡ ርእዩኬ፡ዘከመ፡ ታፈቅር፡ ወትረድኦሙ፡ ለክርስቲያን፡ ወታወድቆሙ፡ ለአረሚ፡አግብርተ፡ ሠይጣን፨ እግዚእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ ወላዲተ፡ በረከተ፡ ጸሎታ፡ የሀሉ፡ምስለ፡ አግብርቲሃ፡…

msItem.title: I-3) ʾƎsäggǝd läki wä-ʾǝweddǝsäki “I worship Thee…”
msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; name of the donor (hand b); groups of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1, I-2, I-4; II ; incipit of all other texts, incipit of sections and of subsections (sometimes only the first word); the word täfäśśǝḥi “rejoice” in Text I-3; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

incipit.p: Fol. 11va, l.7: እሰግድ፡ ለኪ፡ እሰግድ፡ ለኪ፡ ወእዌድሰኪ፡ ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ማርያም፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ ለመርዓዊ፡ {ሰማይ}፡ ጽርሑ፨ በከመ፡ ወደስኪ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ አፈ፡ ወርቅ፡ በመኃልይሁ፡…

explicit.p: Fol. 12vb, l.1: ኦእግዝእትየ፡ ማርያም፡ ሰአሊ፡ ወጸልዪ፡ ኀበ፡ ፍቁር፡ ወልድኪ፡ ከመ፡ ይስረይ፡ ለነ፡ ኃጣውኢነ፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፨

msItem.title: I-2) Introductory exhortation
msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; name of the donor (hand b); groups of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1, I-2, I-4; II ; incipit of all other texts, incipit of sections and of subsections (sometimes only the first word); the word täfäśśǝḥi “rejoice” in Text I-3; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

incipit.p: Fol. 8ra, l.1: መቅድመ፡ ተአምር፡ ዘይትነበብ፡ በሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን። ንነግረክሙ፡ አኃዊነ፡ ፍቁራን፡ ውሉደ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን፨ እግዚአብሔር፡ይባርክሙ፡ ወያብርህ፡ አዕይንተ፡ አልባቢክሙ፨ ለሰሚዓ፡ ተአምሪሃ፡ለእግዝእትነ፡ ቅድስት፡ ድንግል፡ በክልኤ፡ ማርያም፡…

foreign.p: [Fol. 8ra, l.1]: The foreword of the miracles which to be read during the Christian Sunday. We will tell you, our brothers, children of the church, may God bless you and enlighten the eyes of your hearts to listen to the miracles of our Lady Mary, the holy and twofold Virgin.

explicit.p: Fol. 11rb, l.15: ቅዱሳን፡ ወንጹሐን፡ ድንግልናኪ፡ እለ፡ ይሴብሑ። ኀበ፡ ሥዕልኪ፡ እንዘ፡ ይጸርኁ፡[Fol. 11va] ብርሃነ፡ ጸጋኪ፡ ይትሞጥሑ፡ ኀበ፡ ቤተ፡ መርዓሁ፡ ለወልድኪ፡ ያንፈርዕፁ፡ ወይትፌሥሑ፡ ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፨ በስራሕ፨

msItem.title: I-1) Mäṣḥafä śǝrʿat – Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah
msItem.rubric: Nomina sacra; name of the donor (hand b); groups of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1, I-2, I-4; II ; incipit of all other texts, incipit of sections and of subsections (sometimes only the first word); the word täfäśśǝḥi “rejoice” in Text I-3; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

incipit.p: Fol. 1ra, l.1: በስመ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ፩አምላክ፡ ዝንቱ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ ተአምር፡ ዘይትነበብ፡ እምቅድመ፡ ያንብቡ፡ ተአምሪሃ፡ ለእግዝእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ ዝንቱ፡ መጽሐፈ፡ ሥርዓት፡ ዘወፅአ፡ እምንበረ፡ ማርቆስ፡ ሐዋርያ፡ እመካነ፡ መዓልቃ፡ ዘምስር፡ ዘአንበሩ፡ መምህራን፡ መጋብያነ፡ ምሥጢር፡ ርቱዓነ፡ ሃይማኖት።

foreign.p: [Fol. 1ra, l.1] In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit, One God. This book of rules that came from the seat of Mark the Apostle, from the church of Mäˁalqa (al-Muˁallaqah) of Məsr (i.e. Cairo) wherein the doctors, the glorious patriarchs, the treasurers of the mystery, the righteous had laid it up.

explicit.p: Fol. 7vb, l.13: ለከ፡ ይደሉ፡ ስብሐት፡ በጽዮን፨ ወለከ፡ ይትፈና፡ ጸሎት፡ በኢየሩሳሌም፨ ስማዕ፡ ጸሎተ፡ ዘሥጋ፡…

p.span: ዝንቱ: መጽሐፍ፡ ዘዑራ፡ ወጢንየ: ቃሉ፡ ዘኢኈለቅ፡ ነገሩ፡ ፈጸምኩ፡ አነ፡ በ{እንተ}ዕበዩ፡ ለቂርቆስ፡ ሰማዕት፡ መስተጋድል፡ ኢረከብኩ፡ እንበለ፡ ማቅ፡ ወኢፈትል፡ ከመ፡ ይትዋኀሰኒ፡ በመንግሥተ፡ ሰማያት፡ ያብኣኒ፡ ውስተ፡ ጽርሑ፡ ሐዳስ። እለ፡ አጽሐፍዋ፡ ወዘጸሐፋ፡ ይጽሐፉ፡ ኀበ፡ ዓምደ፡ ወርቅ፡ ለዓለም፡ አሜን።

colophon.note: The note is written in hand a (Zä-Wäldä Maryam).

supportDesc.extent:
Made of 144.0 folios, of which 0.0 blank, in 16.0 quires.
22.9 20.0 7.0
supportDesc.condition: The manuscript is very worn and damaged. A part of each board is broken off. The Ms. has been rebound, probably more than once. Text I (quires I-XIII) might have previously been preserved in two codices. The last quire consists of several folios originating from different codices. All quires are reinforced with parchment guards. Some fols. are misplaced (e.g, fols. 46, 142). Holes and tears are carefully amended on fols. 29, 31, 34, 36, 83, 93, 101, 102, 110, 125, 141. 2/3 of fol. 138 is cut off. Fol. 142 is cut in the outer and bottom margin.

layout.ab: The upper line is written above the ruling.
The bottom line is written above the ruling.
The upper line is written above the ruling.
The bottom line is written above the ruling.
The upper line is written above the ruling.
The bottom line is written above the ruling.

list.item: II. Nine dot red and black asterisk;
III. Chain of black and red dots;
Two chains of black and red dots with three nine dot red and black asterisk between (s. fol. 88r);
One black line and one red line (s. fol. 99v);

handDesc.handNote:
Hand a: mediocre but careful Hand b: mediocre Hand c: irregular Black; red. Zä-Wäldä Maryam, Wäldä TǝnśaʾeZä-Wäldä Maryam is mentioned as the scribe in the supplication formulas on fols. 121vb, 124vb and 125vb. He might be the same scribe as that of Ms. QMM-011. Wäldä Tǝnśaʾe is mentioned as the scribe on fol. 138r.Second half of the 18th century.
ሰ fofol. 7rb-va:
ይዲ፡ for ይበል፡ ዲያቆን፡
fol. 88ra:
ዲ፡ for ይበል፡ ዲያቆን፡
ካ፡ for ይበል፡ ካህን፡
ሕ፡ for ይበል፡ ሕዝብ፡
r ሰላም (s. fol. 143, l.2)
quire I-XIII (Text I); rounded script with wide, broadly spaced letters. Some letters have a big circular vowel marker (e.g., ሎ ቤ ግ).
quire XVI (Texts III-V); probably different hands.

item.p: Fol. 142rb: Supplication of the commissioner of writing.

list.item: - The title ተም፡ ማርያም is written upside down on the front board with black modern paint. - Unreadable note in the bottom margin: fol. 143.

binding.decoNote: Two wooden boards (the front board is broken). Two pairs of sewing stations.

projectDesc.p: Encoded according to TEI P5 Guidelines.

person.persName: The names of ʿAmdä Mäsqäl and ʾAwad are written in the supplications formulas in quires XI-XIII, in hand a. Further names are mentioned in the concluding formula on fol. 125vb: Gäbrä Dǝngǝl, ʿAsbä Maryam, ʿAmdä Giyorgis. Wälättä Krǝstos is mentioned in the supplications formulas in quires XIV-XV, in hand b. In addition, Kǝflä Maryam is mentioned as the commissioner on fol. 138r. ʾAbunä Kǝflä Maryam is also mentioned in the supplication formulas in quire XVI.

revisionDesc.change: transformed from mycore to TEI P5
